SamPy.bolshoi.plotMassRatios.stellarHaloMFRatio¶

SamPy.bolshoi.plotMassRatios.stellarHaloMFRatio(path, database, redshifts, output_folder, outfile, xmin=10.0, xmax=14.4, ymin=-3, ymax=-1, nbins=15, h=0.7)¶

Plots stellar to dark matter halo mass ratios as a function of redshift.
